user_query: I'm a health blogger and I want to create a BMI calculator for my website. Can you suggest an API that provides BMI calculation using different units of measurement? It would be helpful if the API also offers weight categorization based on BMI.

TaskList.description: Research available APIs that provide BMI calculations and weight categorization.
Select an appropriate API based on features, reliability, and documentation.
Register for the selected API to obtain access credentials.
Implement the API in your website's code to allow users to input height and weight for BMI calculation.
Test the BMI calculator on the website to ensure it functions correctly with various input units and categorizes weight accurately.
